name: Mak%27o_Rad
content:
Mak'o Rad was a Human male Imperial counter-intelligence agent who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. He was featured on the painting Imperial Agent.
The painting Imperial Agent featuring Mak'o Rad appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Imperial Agent was one of three paintings that could be gained after the launch of "Game Update 16," released on March 23, 2010.
